title: paranE vA
sahitya:
paranE vA idu dadhi emparanE vara idu dadhi em aruL
Anandadiri mudaloru guruparanE vara idu dahi em


anupallavi

  Ananda lOka nittiya jIva paranu nin tiruppugazh paDittu unait-tudittDa


caraNam 1    bhAvattin palan parandOTTa bhuvOrgaL paralOkam varuga enavum kUvi
AvalAga jIva kani tara kanimari tiru sutanAga bhuvi varu
    caraNam 2    tAmadam seyyil nalamO nI baliyAgi tiru udiramum tandAi
nAthanAga jnAna oLi tara bhava iruLara parishuudAviyum tanda
    caraNam 3    prakAmin kulamAgi aruLAnanda uruvAi guru summEvi
sAyam yAvum nIngip-padam pera tiru uyir baliyAgik-kAtta
